How to use the app?
 
Problem statement: Wanting to share images from twitter directly to any other app(whatsapp,facebook,instagram). Twitter only provides link. Through this app you can directly do that. 
 
 Steps:
 1)Go to the TweetPic you want to share
 2)Press Share button
 3)In option choose TrueShare
 4)TrueShare will open another Chooser 
 5)Now choose the intended application
 5)Awesome,You are done.

 This is just a Beta App.
